issue.title: [CF 232] Lua error........
issue.body:
version:r117

``` ^1^T^SType^Sconditionicon ^SEvents^T ^SOnShow^T ^SSound^STMW~`-~`Ding~`9 ^t^t^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SRAIDICON ^SLevel^N8 ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^SName^SInterface\TargetingFrame\UI-RaidTargetingIcon_8 ^t^N44004^^ ```


``` 14x <string>:"TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon1 Condition":1: attempt to call global "GetRaidTargetIndex" (a nil value) <string>:"TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon1 Condition":1: in function "CndtCheck" TellMeWhen-r116\Types\conditionicon.lua:43: in function "OnUpdate" TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r116.lua:997: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:965> Locals: icon = TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon1 { 0 = <userdata> SetScript = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2174 ConditionAlpha = 0 __vrtxcolor = 1 SetAlpha = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2139 SetReverse = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2198 __normaltex = <unnamed> {} OnUpdate = <func> @..\Types\conditionicon.lua:39 Type = "conditionicon" OnShow = <table> {} cbar = TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon1CooldownBar {} HandleEvent = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2103 SetInfo = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2268 Events = <table> {} Conditions = <table> {} setscript = <func> =[C]:-1 group = TellMeWhen_Group5 {} pbar = TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon1PowerBar {} __start = 0 FakeHidden = false countText = TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon1Count {} setalpha = <func> =[C]:-1 UpdateTimer = 8790.557 __reverse = false texture = TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon1Icon {} Enabled = true __duration = 0 __tex = "TargetingFrame\UI-RaidTargetingIcon_8" SetTexture = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2187 RegisterEvent = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2193 __realDuration = 0 NameFirst = "TargetingFrame\UI-RaidTargetingIcon_8" __count = "UPDATE ME!" Name = "TargetingFrame\UI-RaidTargetingIcon_8" CndtCheck = <func> TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon1 Condition:0 registerevent = <func> =[C]:-1 __shown = 1 cooldown = TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon1Cooldown {} FakeAlpha = 0 } time = 8790.557 CndtCheck = <func> TellMeWhen_Group5_Icon1 Condition:0 UPD_INTV = 0.04 ```

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #232 | Raw
